<a id="TextServerExtension"></a>

# TextServerExtension

**Inherits:** [TextServer](TextServer.md) **\<** [RefCounted](RefCounted.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

**Inherited By:** [TextServerAdvanced](TextServerAdvanced.md), [TextServerDummy](TextServerDummy.md), [TextServerFallback](TextServerFallback.md)

Base class for custom [TextServer](TextServer.md) implementations (plugins).

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

External [TextServer](TextServer.md) implementations should inherit from this class.

## Method Descriptions

<a id="TextServerExtension_private_method__cleanup"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **_cleanup**\ (\ ) <span class="virtual">virtual</span> [](#TextServerExtension_private_method__cleanup)

This method is called before text server is unregistered.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="TextServerExtension_private_method__create_font"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[RID](RID.md) **_create_font**\ (\ ) <span class="virtual">virtual</span> <span class="required">required</span> [](#TextServerExtension_private_method__create_font)

Creates a new, empty font cache entry resource.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="TextServerExtension_private_method__create_font_linked_variation"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[RID](RID.md) **_create_font_linked_variation**\ (\ font_rid\: [RID](RID.md)\ ) <span class="virtual">virtual</span> [](#TextServerExtension_private_method__create_font_linked_variation)

Optional, implement if font supports extra spacing or baseline offset.

Creates a new variation existing font which is reusing the same glyph cache and font data.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="TextServerExtension_private_method__create_shaped_text"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[RID](RID.md) **_create_shaped_text**\ (\ direction\: [Direction](TextServer.md#enum_TextServer_Direction), orientation\: [Orientation](TextServer.md#enum_TextServer_Orientation)\ ) <span class="virtual">virtual</span> <span class="required">required</span> [](#TextServerExtension_private_method__create_shaped_text)

Creates a new buffer for complex text layout, with the given `direction` and `orientation`.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="TextServerExtension_private_method__font_draw_glyph"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **_font_draw_glyph**\ (\ font_rid\: [RID](RID.md), canvas\: [RID](RID.md), size\: [int](int.md), pos\: [Vector2](Vector2.md), index\: [int](int.md), color\: [Color](Color.md), oversampling\: [float](float.md)\ ) <span class="virtual">virtual</span> <span class="required">required</span> <span class="const">const</span> [](#TextServerExtension_private_method__font_draw_glyph)

Draws single glyph into a canvas item at the position, using `font_rid` at the size `size`. If `oversampling` is greater than zero, it is used as font oversampling factor, otherwise viewport oversampling settings are used.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="TextServerExtension_private_method__font_draw_glyph_outline"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **_font_draw_glyph_outline**\ (\ font_rid\: [RID](RID.md), canvas\: [RID](RID.md), size\: [int](int.md), outline_size\: [int](int.md), pos\: [Vector2](Vector2.md), index\: [int](int.md), color\: [Color](Color.md), oversampling\: [float](float.md)\ ) <span class="virtual">virtual</span> <span class="required">required</span> <span class="const">const</span> [](#TextServerExtension_private_method__font_draw_glyph_outline)

Draws single glyph outline of size `outline_size` into a canvas item at the position, using `font_rid` at the size `size`. If `oversampling` is greater than zero, it is used as font oversampling factor, otherwise viewport oversampling settings are used.

Returns font family name.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="TextServerExtension_private_method__font_get_opentype_feature_overrides"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[Dictionary](Dictionary.md) **_font_get_opentype_feature_overrides**\ (\ font_rid\: [RID](RID.md)\ ) <span class="virtual">virtual</span> <span class="const">const</span> [](#TextServerExtension_private_method__font_get_opentype_feature_overrides)

Returns font OpenType feature set override.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="TextServerExtension_private_method__font_get_ot_name_strings"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[Dictionary](Dictionary.md) **_font_get_ot_name_strings**\ (\ font_rid\: [RID](RID.md)\ ) <span class="virtual">virtual</span> <span class="const">const</span> [](#TextServerExtension_private_method__font_get_ot_name_strings)

Returns [Dictionary](Dictionary.md) with OpenType font name strings (localized font names, version, description, license information, sample text, etc.).

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="TextServerExtension_private_method__font_get_oversampling"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[float](float.md) **_font_get_oversampling**\ (\ font_rid\: [RID](RID.md)\ ) <span class="virtual">virtual</span> <span class="const">const</span> [](#TextServerExtension_private_method__font_get_oversampling)

Returns oversampling factor override. If set to a positive value, overrides the oversampling factor of the viewport this font is used in. See [Viewport.oversampling](Viewport.md#Viewport_property_oversampling). This value doesn't override the ``oversampling`` parameter of ``draw_*`` methods. Used by dynamic fonts only.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

Returns scaling factor of the color bitmap font.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="TextServerExtension_private_method__font_get_script_support_override"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="TextServerExtension_private_method__font_get_size_cache_info"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[Array](Array.md)\[[Dictionary](Dictionary.md)\] **_font_get_size_cache_info**\ (\ font_rid\: [RID](RID.md)\ ) <span class="virtual">virtual</span> <span class="const">const</span> [](#TextServerExtension_private_method__font_get_size_cache_info)

Returns font cache information, each entry contains the following fields: ``Vector2i size_px`` - font size in pixels, ``float viewport_oversampling`` - viewport oversampling factor, ``int glyphs`` - number of rendered glyphs, ``int textures`` - number of used textures, ``int textures_size`` - size of texture data in bytes.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="TextServerExtension_private_method__font_get_size_cache_list"></a>

Returns list of the font sizes in the cache. Each size is [Vector2i](Vector2i.md) with font size and outline size.

Sets glyph offset from the baseline.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="TextServerExtension_private_method__font_set_hinting"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

Sets font hinting mode. Used by dynamic fonts only.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="TextServerExtension_private_method__font_set_keep_rounding_remainders"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **_font_set_keep_rounding_remainders**\ (\ font_rid\: [RID](RID.md), keep_rounding_remainders\: [bool](bool.md)\ ) <span class="virtual">virtual</span> [](#TextServerExtension_private_method__font_set_keep_rounding_remainders)

Sets glyph position rounding behavior. If set to ``true``, when aligning glyphs to the pixel boundaries rounding remainders are accumulated to ensure more uniform glyph distribution. This setting has no effect if subpixel positioning is enabled.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="TextServerExtension_private_method__font_set_kerning"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **_font_set_kerning**\ (\ font_rid\: [RID](RID.md), size\: [int](int.md), glyph_pair\: [Vector2i](Vector2i.md), kerning\: [Vector2](Vector2.md)\ ) <span class="virtual">virtual</span> [](#TextServerExtension_private_method__font_set_kerning)

Sets kerning for the pair of glyphs.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="TextServerExtension_private_method__font_set_language_support_override"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

Adds override for [_font_is_language_supported()](TextServerExtension.md#TextServerExtension_private_method__font_is_language_supported).

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="TextServerExtension_private_method__font_set_modulate_color_glyphs"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **_font_set_modulate_color_glyphs**\ (\ font_rid\: [RID](RID.md), modulate\: [bool](bool.md)\ ) <span class="virtual">virtual</span> [](#TextServerExtension_private_method__font_set_modulate_color_glyphs)

If set to ``true``, color modulation is applied when drawing colored glyphs, otherwise it's applied to the monochrome glyphs only.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="TextServerExtension_private_method__font_set_msdf_pixel_range"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **_font_set_msdf_pixel_range**\ (\ font_rid\: [RID](RID.md), msdf_pixel_range\: [int](int.md)\ ) <span class="virtual">virtual</span> [](#TextServerExtension_private_method__font_set_msdf_pixel_range)

Sets the width of the range around the shape between the minimum and maximum representable signed distance.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="TextServerExtension_private_method__font_set_msdf_size"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **_font_set_msdf_size**\ (\ font_rid\: [RID](RID.md), msdf_size\: [int](int.md)\ ) <span class="virtual">virtual</span> [](#TextServerExtension_private_method__font_set_msdf_size)

Sets source font size used to generate MSDF textures.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="TextServerExtension_private_method__font_set_multichannel_signed_distance_field"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **_font_set_multichannel_signed_distance_field**\ (\ font_rid\: [RID](RID.md), msdf\: [bool](bool.md)\ ) <span class="virtual">virtual</span> [](#TextServerExtension_private_method__font_set_multichannel_signed_distance_field)

If set to ``true``, glyphs of all sizes are rendered using single multichannel signed distance field generated from the dynamic font vector data. MSDF rendering allows displaying the font at any scaling factor without blurriness, and without incurring a CPU cost when the font size changes (since the font no longer needs to be rasterized on the CPU). As a downside, font hinting is not available with MSDF. The lack of font hinting may result in less crisp and less readable fonts at small sizes.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="TextServerExtension_private_method__font_set_name"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **_font_set_name**\ (\ font_rid\: [RID](RID.md), name\: [String](String.md)\ ) <span class="virtual">virtual</span> [](#TextServerExtension_private_method__font_set_name)

Sets the font family name.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

Sets font OpenType feature set override.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="TextServerExtension_private_method__font_set_oversampling"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **_font_set_oversampling**\ (\ font_rid\: [RID](RID.md), oversampling\: [float](float.md)\ ) <span class="virtual">virtual</span> [](#TextServerExtension_private_method__font_set_oversampling)

If set to a positive value, overrides the oversampling factor of the viewport this font is used in. See [Viewport.oversampling](Viewport.md#Viewport_property_oversampling). This value doesn't override the ``oversampling`` parameter of ``draw_*`` methods. Used by dynamic fonts only.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="TextServerExtension_private_method__shaped_text_draw"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **_shaped_text_draw**\ (\ shaped\: [RID](RID.md), canvas\: [RID](RID.md), pos\: [Vector2](Vector2.md), clip_l\: [float](float.md), clip_r\: [float](float.md), color\: [Color](Color.md), oversampling\: [float](float.md)\ ) <span class="virtual">virtual</span> <span class="const">const</span> [](#TextServerExtension_private_method__shaped_text_draw)

Draw shaped text into a canvas item at a given position, with `color`. `pos` specifies the leftmost point of the baseline (for horizontal layout) or topmost point of the baseline (for vertical layout). If `oversampling` is greater than zero, it is used as font oversampling factor, otherwise viewport oversampling settings are used.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="TextServerExtension_private_method__shaped_text_draw_outline"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **_shaped_text_draw_outline**\ (\ shaped\: [RID](RID.md), canvas\: [RID](RID.md), pos\: [Vector2](Vector2.md), clip_l\: [float](float.md), clip_r\: [float](float.md), outline_size\: [int](int.md), color\: [Color](Color.md), oversampling\: [float](float.md)\ ) <span class="virtual">virtual</span> <span class="const">const</span> [](#TextServerExtension_private_method__shaped_text_draw_outline)

Draw the outline of the shaped text into a canvas item at a given position, with `color`. `pos` specifies the leftmost point of the baseline (for horizontal layout) or topmost point of the baseline (for vertical layout). If `oversampling` is greater than zero, it is used as font oversampling factor, otherwise viewport oversampling settings are used.

<a id="TextServerExtension_private_method__string_get_word_breaks"></a>

Returns an array of the word break boundaries. Elements in the returned array are the offsets of the start and end of words. Therefore the length of the array is always even.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="TextServerExtension_private_method__unreference_oversampling_level"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **_unreference_oversampling_level**\ (\ oversampling\: [float](float.md)\ ) <span class="virtual">virtual</span> [](#TextServerExtension_private_method__unreference_oversampling_level)

Decreases the reference count of the specified oversampling level, and frees the font cache for oversampling level when the reference count reaches zero. This method is called by [Viewport](Viewport.md), and should not be used directly.
